name: SAEUS (jib77907)
description:
Meet the Saeus, a mysterious, deer-like creature that roams the forest at night and disappears when the sun rises. Due to the tale of its existence, a YouTuber and a Ranger enters into the magical forest after dusk in order to take some photos to prove that the Saeus is indeed real and benefit from their findings.

Saeus is a 3D, 3-player game where all players compete against each other to reach their objectives. The players can pick from the 3 characters with varying abilities:

  • The Saeus
    • Objective: To avoid getting taken pictures of until sunrise
    • Abilities: Can turn invisible and can rush to destroy pictures when they collect enough mushrooms
    • Controls: 
      • Left Stick to move 
      • Right stick to rotate 
      • L1 or l2 to turn invisible 
      • R1 or R2 to dash and destroy pictures
      •  X for minimap
  • The YouTuber
    • Objective: To take 5 pictures of the Saeus before sunrise
    • Abilities: Can steal a picture from the Ranger at a distance and can place down live cameras to watch if something passes by
    • Controls:
      • Left Stick to move
      • Right stick to rotate 
      • L1 or L2 to place down a live camera
      • R1 or R2 to take a photo 
      • ○ to steal a picture
      • X for minimap
  • The Ranger
    • Objective: To take 5 pictures of the Saeus before sunrise
    • Abilities: Can run faster than the YouTuber and can place down traps that can capture another player for a while
    • Controls:
      • Left Stick to move
      • Right stick to rotate 
      • L1 or L2 to place down a trap
      • R1 or R2 to take a photo
      • X for minimap

*This game requires 3 controllers and 3 separate screens*
